location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch of land to the north of Fao [Faw] fort

physicalDescription.extent: Material:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:329 x 185 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn sketch map dated 20th July 1908 compiled by the British Political Agent in Kuwait, Stuart George Knox, after he visited the area enclosed with a letter no. 399 (folios 168-176).Shows land in dispute between Sheikh Mobarak and the Turkish Military authorities at Fao [Faw] Fort with plots labelled for reference.
